body.name: 24 Pcs Letter Writing Stationery Paper Set Woodland Animal Design Greeting Cards with Envelopes for Kids Classroom Birthday Party
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 22 hrs 4 mins
features: What You Get - 24 stationery Paper, 24 envelopes. The paper size is 8.3 x 7.1 inch, fold size is 6.3 x 4 inch. 6 woodland animal design, 4 pieces each pattern. Include Owl, Raccoon, Reindeer, Zebra, Hedgehog.
Cute Woodland Animal Design - The folded stationery is designed with animal, the ears stand up, very vivid. Cards are blank on the inside, leaving plenty of space to write message.
Perfect Gift for Kids - Lovely animal design will attract children's attention, kids will love these letter writing paper. When it is folded, you can put money on the cards as money holder.

Wide Use - Perfect gift and suitable cards for almost any occasions, such as school activities, birthday party, classroom exchange, family gathering and more. Can be use as greeting cards, invitation cards, stationery paper and more.
Our Advantages - Bright Color. Made of card paper. Easy to fold. And our white envelope is suitable for the animal letter writing paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable Letter writing...
reviews.reviewText: These are adorable foldable lined notecards. I bought a set of grandparent pen pal notecards and then I thought - I should have something fun to send to my grandkids. They are so fun. The fold up tri-fold. Ears pop up and "foot" closes the notecard. The come with a large envelope. (Probably larger than needed - but allows you to add "extras" in the envelope. Matching sticker for each notecard to place on the outside of the envelope.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous way to encourage kids to write
reviews.reviewText: We used these cards in a letter-writing campaign to kids in hospitals. The adults and the kids who participated loved these adorable foldable letters. They are absolutely priceless. Each animal sheet had ears that stuck up and a paw that kept the folded letter in place, plus, there was a sticker to seal the envelope. I bought many types of stationary supplies for this project, and this was the cutest and also the best buy. I plan to buy some sets to send to youngsters in my life. What a great way to encourage the (lost) art of letter-writing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So cute! Motivating for my kids to write letters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Okay for price.
reviews.reviewText: The paper is a nice thick quality but the envelopes feel cheap (very thin paper) and are a bit too large for the papers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The kids love pen paling with these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I send cards to our grandchildren on a regular basis. I like cute cards that are blank inside so that I can write a very simple note, sign it and add cute stickers to decorate it on the inside. I happened to see these when I was searching for more cards to buy for the grandchildren and I knew these would be a great delight for the grandkids. They are so cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun designs- tuck into animals paws to close.
reviews.reviewText: Awesome stationary! Cute designs (the letter folds easy and tucks into the animals’ front paws to keep the letter closed). We got these, along with a Melissa and dough mailbox set for each Fmaily member, and had an evening of writing each other encouraging letters. My kids loved using these. Made it very fun and memorable. My 7 yr old son said it was the “best day ever,” and kept thanking me for getting these. We kept out letters received in little keepsake boxes, and keep the extras in a basket next to the mailboxes for a fun surprising note for each other once in a while. These just made this activity even more enjoyable. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I send letters to my 5-year-old niece, and these are perfect, they are sturdy and cute.
